Name: FretCount
Comments: The total number of frets

Name: StringCount
Comments: The total number of strings

Name: NeutralFret
Comments: The fret which is perpendicular to the fretboard's centerline when scale lengths aren't equal

Name: ScaleLengthBass
Comments: Scale length for the top-most string of a multiscale guitar

Name: ScaleLengthTreb
Comments: Scale length for the bottom-most string of a multiscale guitar

Name: GuitarLength
Comments: Overall length of the guitar-- along the X-xis

Name: GuitarWidth
Comments: Overall width of the guitar-- along the Y-axis

Name: GuitarHeight
Comments: Overall thickness of the guitar-- along the Z-axis

Name: BodyLength
Comments: Overall length of the body-- along the X-axis

Name: BodyWidth
Comments: Overall width of the body-- along the Y-axis

Name: BodyHeight
Comments: Overall thickness of the guitar body-- along the Z-axis

Name: HeadstockLength
Comments: Overall length of the headstock-- along the X-axis

Name: HeadstockWidth
Comments: Overall width of the headstock-- along the Y-axis

Name: HeadstockHeight
Comments: Overall thickness of the headstock-- along the Z-axis

Name: FretThickness1
Comments: Overall thickness of the neck at the 1st fret's position- including the fretboard thickness

Name: FretThickness12
Comments: Overall thickness of the neck at the 12th fret's position- including the fretboard thickness

Name: FretboardThickness
Comments: Overall thickness of the fretboard-- along the Z-axis

Name: HeelExtension
Comments: Length of the material beyond of the final fret of the fretboard toward the bridge

Name: FretboardExtension
Comments: Length of the material forward of the nut-edge of the fretboard toward the headstock

Name: FretboardLengthBass
Comments: This draws the length of the fretboard's bass-edge so that the heel will be neutral with the final fret

Name: FretboardLengthTreb
Comments: This draws the length of the fretboard's treble-edge so that the heel will be neutral with the final fret

Name: FretboardLengthBassRND
Comments: This rounds the overall vertical length of the fretboard's bass-edge to the nearest 1/8"

Name: FretboardLengthTrebRND
Comments: This rounds the overall vertical length of the fretboard's treble-edge to the nearest 1/8"

Name: FretSpacingBass
Expression: if(( ScaleLengthBass == ScaleLengthTreb ); sqrt(( BridgeSpacing - NutSpacing ) ^ 2 / 4 + ScaleLengthBass ^ 2) * ( 1 - 1 / 2 ^ ( 1 / 12 ) ); ScaleLengthBass * ( 1 - 1 / 2 ^ ( 1 / 12 ) ))
Comments: The distance between the nut and the 1st fret intersection along the top-most string using "on-center" measurement. The length adjusts based on if the scale length is single or multi and accounts for the subtle difference between the two.

Name: FretSpacingTreb
Expression: if(( ScaleLengthBass == ScaleLengthTreb ); sqrt(( BridgeSpacing - NutSpacing ) ^ 2 / 4 + ScaleLengthTreb ^ 2) * ( 1 - 1 / 2 ^ ( 1 / 12 ) ); ScaleLengthTreb * ( 1 - 1 / 2 ^ ( 1 / 12 ) ))
Comments: The distance between the nut and the 1st fret intersection along the bottom-most string using "on-center" measurement. The length adjusts based on if the scale length is single or multi and accounts for the subtle difference between the two.

Name: ScaleLengthSpacingBass
Expression: if(( ScaleLengthBass == ScaleLengthTreb ); sqrt(( BridgeSpacing - NutSpacing ) ^ 2 / 4 + ScaleLengthBass ^ 2); ScaleLengthBass)

Name: ScaleLengthSpacingTreb
Expression: if(( ScaleLengthBass == ScaleLengthTreb ); sqrt(( BridgeSpacing - NutSpacing ) ^ 2 / 4 + ScaleLengthTreb ^ 2); ScaleLengthTreb)

Name: NeutralFretOffset
Comments: This offsets the treble-edge of the fretboard to create the defined neutral fret

Name: MarginNut
Comments: The distance between the center of the bass string and the edge of the fretboard at the nut-end

Name: MarginHeel
Comments: The distance between the center of the bass string and the edge of the fretboard at the heel-end

Name: SaddleSpacing
Comments: Spacing between each saddle-- center-to-center

Name: BridgeSpacing
Comments: Spacing distance between the high and low strings at the bridge

Name: NutSlotSpacing
Comments: Spacing between each slot on the nut-- center-to-center

Name: NutSpacing
Comments: Spacing distance between the high and low strings at the nut

Name: NutLength
Comments: Overall length of the nut-- along the Y-axis

Name: NutWidth
Comments: Overall width of the nut-- along the X-axis

Name: NutHeight
Comments: Overall height of the nut-- along the Z-axis

Name: NutDepth
Comments: The depth of which the nut slot must be cut

Name: TangWidth
Comments: Width of the fret tang for the fret slot

Name: TangDepth
Comments: Depth of the fret tang for the fret slot

Name: FretCrownWidth
Comments: Width of the crown of the fret

Name: FretCrownHeight
Comments: Height of the crown of the fret

Name: ZeroFretCrownWidth
Comments: Width of the crown of the zero fret

Name: ZeroFretCrownHeight
Comments: Height of the crown of the zero fret

Name: ZeroFretAdjust
Comments: Adjustment at the nut-edge of the fretboard for a Zero Fret

Name: NutRadius
Comments: Radius of the fretboard at the nut

Name: HeelRadius
Comments: Radius of the fretboard at the heel

Name: HeelCurveRadius
Comments: Radius of the fretboard heel-edge curve

Name: HeelFillet
Comments: Fillet radius for the fretboard heeledge corners

Name: BlindFret
Comments: The distance from the edge of the fretboard to the end of the hidden tang

Name: BlindNut
Comments: The distance from the edge of the fretboard to the end of the hidden tang

Name: HangFret
Comments: This is a buffer for the frets to extend past the edges of the fretboard- 0 for Off, 1 for On

Name: BindingInset
Comments: The distance inward to reduce the perimeter of the fretboard for applying a binding

Name: FretMarkerDiaTop
Comments: Diameter of the fret markers along the surface of the fretboard

Name: FretMarkerDiaSide
Comments: Diameter of the fret markers along the edge of the fretboard

Name: FretMarkerDepth
Comments: Depth of the fret markers from the surface of the fretboard

Name: FretMarkerOctaveSpacing
Comments: The distance between the center points of the fret markers at the octaves

Name: FretScallopWidth
Comments: This value is the buffer from the edge of the scallop to the fret

Name: FretScallopDepthBass
Comments: Depth of the scallop cut on the bass edge

Name: FretScallopDepthTreb
Comments: Depth of the scallop cut on the treble edge

Name: FretScallopFillet
Comments: This fillet is used to help blend the scallop into the fretboard as desired

Name: FallAwayFret
Comments: At which fret the fallaway taper begings

Name: FallAwayLength
Comments: The distance from the nut for the starting point of the falloff curve

Name: FallAwayDepth
Comments: The depth from the fretboard height at the heel-end which the taper terminates

Name: StringGauge1
Comments: In standard tuning- typically your ' e ' string

Name: StringGauge2
Comments: In standard tuning- typically your ' B ' string

Name: StringGauge3
Comments: In standard tuning- typically your ' G ' string

Name: StringGauge4
Comments: In standard tuning- typically your ' D ' string

Name: StringGauge5
Comments: In standard tuning- typically your ' A ' string

Name: StringGauge6
Comments: In standard tuning- typically your ' E ' string

Name: StringGauge7
Comments: Reserved for 7-string guitar

Name: StringGauge8
Comments: Reserved for 8-string guitar

Name: StringAction
Comments: The clearance between the bottom of strings and the crown of the frets

Name: StringEquispacing
Expression: ( NutSpacing - StringGauge1 - StringGauge2 - StringGauge3 - StringGauge4 - StringGauge5 - StringGauge6 - StringGauge7 - StringGauge8 ) / StringCount
Comments: The equal distance between each string
